name: CHORTLE'S SPACE RETORT
description:
Chortle's Space Retort v.2.0

3D Arcade Style Space Shooter

Single player Arcade Style Space Shooter - Player destroys targets related to Power, Communications and Cooling Units on top of evil alien DNA Experimentation Labs.

Success unlock escape doors - Player battles in open space (track) his way towards the Space Station to end game.

Player can end game early by successfully destroying all enemy ships while in main game - good luck with that! :)

Features:

* Retort Survival Mode

* Track Battle Mode
